summary: Neon Doge game/app: update title, fix multiplier behavior (including reset on blue ball), and correct fullscreen/responsive layout to keep consistent vertical space across view widths.
known_issues: Multiplier is not working as expected.
Fullscreen view compresses vertical screen space; vertical space is inconsistent across view widths.

existing_features.title: Change the app/game title text to "Neon Doge" everywhere it is user-visible, including the browser tab title and the landing screen header/hero text.
Fix the in-game multiplier so that it reliably affects scoring during gameplay and is reflected in the HUD as the current multiplier value.
When the player collides with a blue ball power-up, reset the multiplier back to its base value immediately.
Fix fullscreen/responsive layout so that vertical screen space is not compressed in fullscreen mode, and the gameplay view maintains consistent vertical sizing across view widths (mobile/desktop).
